'''''Amon Hen'' 121''' is the one-hundred-and-twenty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[1993]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Albion's Dream''
** By: Howard J. Bates
* Editorial
** By: Derrick Stott
* Contents
* Artwork (border)
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Announcements
* Artwork (border)
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* [[Oxonmoot]]
** By: Valerie Sutton
* Seminar
** By: [[David Doughan]]
* Annie's Allsorts
** By: Annie Haward
* Artwork: ''Untitled''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Where Eagles Dare (the prequel)
** By: Lyn Ritchie
* A Letter from Russia
** By: Zoya
* Unsettled Spells
** By: Tom Stafford
* News of Belladonna
** By: Jessica Yates
* The Destruction of the Ring
** By: Reg Arnold
* The Eagle has Landed
** By: various contributors
* The Hobbit Calendar
** By: Mick Henry
* Artwork: ''Centenary Conference Poster''
** By: [[Patrick H. Wynne|Patrick Wynne]]
* Reviews
** By: various contributors
* Artwork: ''Eldarion''
** By: Pat Gillooly
* [[Tales from the Perilous Realm]]
** By: [[Christina Scull]]
* Small Press
* AGM
** By: Rikki Breem, Richard Crawshaw & [[Chris Crawshaw|Christine Crawshaw]]
* Letters to the Shire
* Artwork: ''Untitled''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Tolk Folk
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* Artwork: ''[[Saruman]] with Palantir''
** By: Paul Carter
* Notes for Contributors
* Special Interest Groups
